name: react-dropzone-kit
description: A versatile Dropzone component library designed to simplify file upload functionality in user interfaces. It supports drag-and-drop file uploads, custom validation rules, and easy integration with other utilities for handling file types, sizes, and multiple file uploads. This library ensures an efficient and user-friendly experience for managing file inputs in modern web applications.
author: Yusuf Kağan Kılıç <yusufkaankilic.yk@gmail.com>
